item.title: Torchtext Snippets
item.description: Load separate files Link to heading data.Field parameters is here. When calling build_vocab, torchtext will add <unk> in vocabulary list. Set unk_token=None if you want to remove it. If sequential=True (default), it will add <pad> in vocab. <unk> and <pad> will add at the beginning of vocabulary list by default. LabelField is similar to Field, but it will set sequential=False, unk_token=None and is_target=Ture INPUT = data.Field(lower=True, batch_first=True) TAG = data.
